name: Roadkill Raceway
description:
In the not so distant future... the power of animal rights organizations has increased 10 fold. All animals are considered to have human level rights with one exception - getting in the way of a public service vehicle is not covered. You must help save the worlds food supply by testing out your vehicle. Farmers regularly bring animal shipments to the vehicle testing raceway for a 'tour' of the track.

Game Features:
5 different tracks
4 different animals
Currently one vehicle type
High powered breaking and acceleration system
Nitro - for a little extra boost once in a while
